hypothesis_content.title: Volatility-Expansion Trend Initiation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC experiences a volatility contraction (20-day ATR < 1.5% of price) followed by a breakout day with volume > 200% of 20-day average and price movement > 3%, entering in the breakout direction will capture the beginning of a new volatility-expansion trend across all regimes except STRESS.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Volatility contractions often precede significant trend moves. High volume breakouts from compression signal institutional participation. This strategy works in directional markets regardless of overall regime (except stress periods which produce false breakouts).
entry_conditions: Price closes in top/bottom 20% of daily range

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price moves 12% in direction of trade OR 10-day ATR expands to > 3.5% of price
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price reverses 6% against position OR 3 days of consolidation (range < 50% of breakout day)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 60% of breakouts fail to sustain direction beyond 3 days, or average profit factor < 1.3 across 100+ instances.
